site_name: Former Hotel Antoinette18-32 And 23-43 Beaufort Road AndFassett RoadKingston Upon ThamesKT1 2TQ
description: Details required by Condition 19 (External Lighting of Common Areas)  of Planning Permission 18/12928/FUL (Demolition of 20-30 Beaufort Road and 25-41 Fassett Road and hotel buildings to rear. Refurbishment and conversion of 18 and 32 Beaufort Road and 23 and 43 Fassett Road, and erection of new buildings to provide a total of 20 houses and 69 flats, together with basement and surface car parking and landscaping (Revision to planning permission15/12107/FUL))
decision_conditions: The applicant is informed that the submitted details are unacceptable and show an incorrect layout to that approved under 18/12928/FUL.  Therefore Condition 19 cannot be discharged.

The assessment has been based on the original layout of the dwelling. The original layout of the dwelling has a rear projection (bay window) and as a result the proposed extension would extend beyond an original side wall and would have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse. The development therefore conflicts with paragraph A.1 (j) (iii).The proposal would require planning permission.
